contracts.title: SEASONAL PROVISION OF MECHANICAL ROAD SWEEPERS AND MINI-SWEEPER WITH DRIVERS
contracts.description:
Contract for the seasonal provision of two mechanical road sweepers with wander hoses and drivers for up to 16 weeks each from mid-October for 40 hours per week Monday to Friday and one mini / precinct sweeper with outboard jet wash and driver for up to a maximum of 17 weeks starting from mid to end of October for 40 hours per week Monday to Friday.
The initial contract is for a period of 1 year which may be extended by up to 2 years giving a maximum contract length of 3 years.
The service sha
contracts.cpv_description: Road sweepers

contracts.title: Drainage Improvements - Mardale Road Playing Fields, Longridge
contracts.description: The works comprise installation of land drainage and landscaping to existing playing fields.
contracts.cpv_description: Drainage and surface works and Drainage works and Drainage construction works and Ground-drainage work and Landscaping work for sports grounds and recreational areas

contracts.title: Road Surfacing Improvements - Dewhurst Road, Langho
contracts.description: The works comprise kerbing, surfacing and associated drainage toan un-adopted no-through road that serves a number of residential properties, a health facility and a sports and social club. The contractor will need to ensure disruption to these properties is minimised whilst carrying out the work.
contracts.cpv_description: Construction, foundation and surface works for highways, roads and Road construction works and Surface work for roads and Kerbstones and Drainage works

contracts.title: PROVISION OF MECHANICAL ROAD SWEEPERS AND MINI-SWEEPER WITH DRIVERS
contracts.description:
Contract for the provision of up to 4 mechanical road sweepers with drivers throughout the year to accommodate seasonal workloads and 1 mini sweeper for up to 25 weeks per year.
The initial contract is for a period of 2 years and may be extended by a further 2 years giving a maximum contract length of 4 years.
The service shall cover the whole of the Ribble Valley and shall include the provision of out of hours call outs including emergency response call outs to be responded to within 40 minut
contracts.cpv_description: Road sweepers

contracts.title: Provision of Swimming Teaching at Ribblesdale Pool, Clitheroe
contracts.cpv_description: Recreational, cultural and sporting services and Sporting services and Education and training services and Specialist training services

contracts.title: Concession Agreement for the Catering Rights at Edisford Riverbank, Clitheroe
contracts.description:
Invitation to tender for a concession agreement to provide catering services at Edisford Riverbank, Clitheroe.
The council wishes to let a concession agreement for a period running up to 31st March 2023 for the supply of ice cream, hot and cold drinks, hot food snacks and confectionery.The concession agreement will, depending upon responses received, be let as a whole for all items or broken down into two packages.
contracts.cpv_description: Catering services

contracts.title: Provision of Catering Services Bowling Green Cafe, Clitheroe
contracts.description:
Ribble Valley Borough Council are inviting tenders to all those interested in providing a catering service to the public at the Bowling Green Cafe, Clitheroe.
Located in the Victorian Park developed around Clitheroe Castle the Bowling Green Cafe provides an excellent opportunity to the right service provider to develop a thriving business venture. The successful tenderer will have the drive and innovation to develop and promote a high quality and imaginative service offering that promotes the R
contracts.cpv_description: Catering services and Canteen and catering services and Cafeteria services

contracts.title: Contract for Purchase of Mixed Paper and Cardboard
contracts.description:
Ribble Valley Borough Council (the Authority) requires provision of recycling services for mixed wastepaper and cardboard ("Mixed Waste") through a service concession with the Authority to receive payment from the Concession Service Provider for the Mixed Waste [Mixed Paper and Cardboard].
The Authority will collect the mixed waste from residential properties within the Ribble Valley Borough and deliver it directly to the concession service provider's designated depot.
contracts.cpv_description: Refuse and waste related services and Non-hazardous refuse and waste treatment and disposal services and Refuse recycling services

contracts.title: Provision of Swimming Teaching at Ribblesdale Pool, Clitheroe
contracts.cpv_description: Recreational, cultural and sporting services and Sporting services and Education and training services and Specialist training services

contracts.title: Public Space CCTV System Upgrade Ribble Valley
contracts.description:
The Ribble Valley Borough Council Public Space CCTV system comprises systems in three separate towns within the borough that are monitored in a 24-hour, 7 days a week monitoring office in Clitheroe.
The works comprise upgrading a number of the existing cameras and upgrades to the control room.
contracts.cpv_description: Surveillance system and Security, fire-fighting, police and defence equipment and Security cameras

contracts.title: Provision of mechanical road sweepers (dual sweep with wander hose) with drivers
contracts.description: The contract requires the provision of one mechanical sweeper with driver for 32 hours per week and for 52 weeks of the year Monday to Thursday. Additional out of hours work and call out work may be required (including Saturdays and Sundays). The Council also requires seasonal use of additional mechanical sweepers with drivers.
contracts.cpv_description: Road sweepers

contracts.title: Replacement of Existing Passenger Lift at Ribble Valley Council Offices, Clitheroe
contracts.description: The works comprise the design, manufacture, supply, construction, installation, and commissioning of one replacement passenger/goods lift service. The existing lift is coming to the end of its useful life and has been assessed for full replacement with a modern MRL traction lift to bring this more in line with current standards and ensure future reliability, life expectancy and efficiency. The premises will remain occupied and open to the public during the course of the works on site.
contracts.cpv_description: Lifts, skip hoists, hoists, escalators and moving walkways and Lift and escalator installation work

contracts.title: The Right to Purchase Mixed Paper and Cardboard
contracts.description:
Ribble Valley Borough Council on behalf of the Waste Management Department is currently inviting tenders from suitably qualified companies for the purchase of mixed paper and cardboard.
Tenderers are required to confirm in the Offer Schedule a price per tonne of all mixed paper and cardboard arising from collections made by the Council and sold on its behalf to a nominated recycling mill or other agent.
Delivery costs to the agreed tenderers depot will be taken into consideration when consider
contracts.cpv_description: Refuse and waste related services

contracts.title: Edisford Sports Complex - 3G Pitches and Pavilion
contracts.description: Build a full size 3G pitch complete with shock pad, floodlights and perimeter netting on an existing green field site; refurbish an existing 3G surface and multi-purpose surface, including new lighting and perimeter fencing. Also included is a brick building containing toilet block, store and community room (Pavilion Building).
contracts.cpv_description: Leisure equipment and Machinery or apparatus for leisure equipment and Construction work for buildings relating to leisure, sports, culture, lodging and restaurants

contracts.title: Provision of Converged Infrastructure Solution
contracts.description: The provision of a converged infrastructure solution to replace the  current infrastructure of physical & virtual servers.
contracts.cpv_description: Computer platforms and Computer equipment and supplies and Information systems and servers

contracts.title: Provision of CCTV Monitoring Services
contracts.description: For the provision of CCTV Monitoring Services.
contracts.cpv_description: Closed circuit television services

contracts.title: Improvement Works at Ribblesdale Pool
contracts.description: Modernisation work to the reception, changing areas and pool viewing gallery at Ribblesdale Pool.  Also the creation of a separate changing area provision with access from the reception area straight to the Pool Hall.
contracts.cpv_description: Construction work for buildings relating to leisure, sports, culture, lodging and restaurants

contracts.title: Tender for the Provision of  Catering Services at The Atrium Café, Clitheroe Castle and/or Bowling Green Café, Clitheroe Castle
contracts.description:
Ribble Valley Borough Council are tendering for the Provision of Catering Services at the Atrium Café and/or the Bowling Green Café, Clitheroe. 
For further information please visit the website www.ribblevalley.gov.uk where all tender documents and information can be viewed.
contracts.cpv_description: Food, beverages, tobacco and related products

contracts.title: Intiviation to Tender for the Purchase of Mixed Paper and Cardboard
contracts.description: Ribble Valley Borough Council on behalf of the Waste Management Department is currently inviting tenders from suitably qualified companies for the purchase of mixed paper and cardboard.
contracts.cpv_description: Printed matter and related products

contracts.title: Provision of Mechanical Road Sweepers (Dual Sweep) with Drivers
contracts.description: Contract for the provision of a mechanical road sweeper with driver for 52 weeks per year and 40 hours per week servicing the whole  of the Ribble Valley. Also additional seasonal hire of two mechanical sweepers with drivers for a potential period of between 14 and 20 weeks starting October for leaf clearance work and 2 weeks in spring.
contracts.cpv_description: Sewage, refuse, cleaning and environmental services

contracts.title: Roof Renewal and Windows Replacement Project
contracts.description:
Expressions of interest are being sought for a roof renewal and windows replacement project at the Council Offices, Church Walk, Clitheroe.
The roof has a natural slate covering, and the windows are being replaced with UPVC framed double glazed tilt and turn units.
contracts.cpv_description: Construction work
